name: this site :)
desc: An interactive catalogue of my ideas and projects.

name: tf2 stalker bot
desc: A Discord bot to track players in TF2. Queries the Steam API and Source Servers to check if certain players are in-game.

name: tf2 stalker site (working title)
desc: A complementary website to browse the data collected by tf2 stalker bot, since Discord messages are a very limiting way to display data.

name: ee4717 project
desc: A fullstack app created for EE4717 Web Application Design. Worth 10% of the overall grade for a live demonstration over Zoom.

name: r experiments
desc: My first forays into the R language by analysing datasets from RateYourMusic and tf2-stalker-bot. Not very polished but I just enjoy playing with data I've generated myself.

name: futoshiki solver
desc: A PyGame implementation of futoshiki, with the feature of automatically solving it.

name: musicbee keystroke visualizer
desc: A MusicBee plugin to act like keycaster, and also to teach myself a bit of C#.

name: nobodyweirdlike.me
desc: My first fullstack project ever. A website to rank songs by the Red Hot Chili Peppers. Used jQuery because it was 2017.
